name: rattled
caption: Rattled

effect.short: Raises [Speed]{mechanic:speed} one [stage]{mechanic:stat-modifier} upon being hit by a []{type:dark}, []{type:ghost}, or []{type:bug} move.
effect.full: This Pokémon's [Speed]{mechanic:speed} rises one stage with each hit from a damaging []{type:dark}-, []{type:ghost}-, or []{type:bug}-type move.

flavorText:
Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the
Pokémon and boost its Speed stat.
